name: Super Chicken Run - Chicken Racing Games for Kids
name_original: Super Chicken Run - Chicken Racing Games for Kids
description:
One of the Most addictive Racing game on AppStore!

Get ready for the Fun chicken racing experience of your life with SUPER CHICKEN RACING !

The aim here is to finish the mission as fast as possible. See how quickly you can do it and perform some fantastic stunts on the way!

Your opponents will try to push you out of the track or push off track.

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
- Exciting
- Different terrains/location
- EASY controls with only 2 buttons
- CRAZY jumps and loops
- Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
- Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition.
- Crazy Addictive Experience.
- Environments That Keeps Changing
- Real Animations And Physics
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
